Photos: Natanz Central Mosque (Masjid-e Jameh)

08/18/17 08/18/17

Photos by Milad Raf'at Mehr News Agency

Link: http://www.payvand.com/news/17/aug/Natanz-Central-Mosque-1.jpg Natanz Central Mosque (Masjid-e Jameh) map | related video

Natanz Central Mosque (Masjid-e Jameh) is located near Sheikh Abdol Samad Isfahani Tomb in the city of Natanz in Iran's Isfahan province. This four-iwanÂ central mosque is one of the best preserved of all Ilkhanid-era buildings, dating from the early 14th century. Look out for the very worn, but intricately carved wooden door at the entrance to the mosque.
